hero.name: Fábio Mendes
hero.summary: Solid experience in IT for 12 years as a Full Stack Developer, Data Analyst, and technical support for infrastructure and systems. Combining deep technical knowledge with strategic business vision, enabling the delivery of solutions that truly impact company results.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Main technologies and tools I use in solution development

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the main projects I developed, demonstrating expertise in different technologies

list.title: DW Health
list.description: Data-Warehouse project for presenting reports, charts, and insights from Primary Healthcare EHR data according to management demand

list.title: BI Health OPPES
list.description: Power BI dashboard for presenting production and financial data of the city’s Health Units

list.title: DiaSus
list.description: Electronic Health Record (EHR) for use in municipal specialty clinics, with features such as appointment scheduling, clinical care, prescription and recipe issuance, standard form completion, and printing or sending by email/WhatsApp

experiences.title: Experience
experiences.subtitle: Professional journey focused on development and data analysis

list.title: Data & Health Analyst at Diadema City Hall
list.description: Development of data warehouse solutions and dashboards for data analysis. Building ETLs. Task automation with AI agents. PostgreSQL database administration and Full Stack software development.

list.title: Systems Analyst at Diadema City Hall
list.description: Responsible for developing web systems for the hospital maintenance and engineering area, requirements analysis, and implementation of scalable solutions. Technical leadership in legacy system modernization projects.

list.title: IT Technician at Agaphone Telemática
list.description: Website development, email marketing. System installation and CCTV equipment configuration.
